venue.name: 21st Amendment

item.description:
"What America needs now is a drink" declared President Franklin D. Roosevelt at the end of Prohibition.

On this day, 78 years ago, the states ratified the 21st Amendment, which repealed the 18th Amendment, a law which had outlawed alcohol.

Let's have a drink (you have the right to choose one with alcohol or without) or two to toast the freedom to imbibe alcohol legally....that is if you're at least 21.

To be honest I chose 21st Amendment for our happy hour for its name only. What is the adage? Location Location Location, well this was because of Name Name Name.

Get there when you can. I'll arrive at 4 and hang until about 6

The first new member who finds me, gets a free drink. Don't be shy...Say hi

Check out MBTA or HopStop  to create your route by public transit.

Park Street (green & red lines), Government (green & blue lines) and Downtown Crossing (orange & red lines) subway stations are no more than a five (5) minute walk away.


I'll be wearing a GREY turtleneck with a one (1) inch sparkly GREEN peace sign sticker on my right shoulder.

 

 

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU
